page.title: 02SCHOOL
page.content: Redbrook Primary School has been open for about 27 years.There are 173 pupils in our school in 6 classes and 40 children come to the nursery.The ages range from 3-11yrs.We start school at 8-55a.m. and finish at 3-30p.m.,there being no school on Saturday or Sunday. We have{assembly}each morning except Monday when dinner money is collected. Dinners cost Â£3 a week and most pupils have{school dinners.}We sit in groups round tables in class and do many things to do with{education.}We have a playing field and playground and go to the swimming baths once a week. Most of us like school and the things we like doing most are Craft,Art and English related activities.
